description:
Try Rocket Money for free: https://RocketMoney.com/ltt 
Check out Ridge’s Father’s Day sale at https://www.ridge.com/LINUS

Cute is more than style - it’s a way of life. It’s not just a gaming PC, nor is it using every shade of pink and it’s certainly not just squishing every plushie you own onto a desk. There is a careful balance of the right parts and peripherals, and we aim to make our prettiest setup EVER!

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1572236-the-cutest-gaming-setup/

Check out the KAWAIIIII products used in this video: https://lmg.gg/ck1zP

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane

title: The Cutest Gaming Setup
